column1: Diesel Fuel For Life For Him Eau de Toilette Spray 125ml
column2: Diesel Fuel for Life Homme is a mythical elixir that evokes images of something that's a source of energy and fuels a passion for life. These emotions, combined with sexiness and seduction, are exactly what Diesel have recreated and bottled - It's Fuel For Life. A magic potion of mysterious star anise, vintage raspberry and authentic heliotropine for him.

column1: Armaf Hunter Killer Eau de Toilette Spray 100ml
column2: Hunter Killer is a bold and spicy fragrance, a fiery energy with smoky accords. The opening is driven by spice with pepper, green apple, incense, nutmeg, cinnamon, and saffron. The heart takes an earthy respite through lavender, patchouli, and jasmine. The base finishes with a shot of tobacco, vetiver, guaiac wood, vanilla, and amber.

column1: Banana Republic Collezione Riservata Velvet Pomegranate Eau de Parfum Spray 75ml
column2:
Velvet Pomegranate folds together a range of warm spices with tart fruity notes. Pomegranate, bergamot, pear, and rhubarb create the opening. The heart brings fresh tuberose, orange blossom, and jasmine. The base concludes with vanilla, patchouli, and musk.

Launched in 2022 the nose behind this fragrance is Christelle Laprade.

Top Notes: Pomegranate, calabrian Bergamot, Pear and Rhubarb
Middle Notes: Tuberose, Orange Blossom and Egyptian Jasmine
Base Notes: Bourbon Vanilla, Indonesian Patchouli Leaf and Musk

column1: Versace Man Eau Fraiche Eau de Toilette Spray 100ml Gift Set
column2: Versace Man Eau Fraiche is an Aromatic-Tonic-Woody fragrance designed for the strong and self-confident man who is fond of luxury. Top notes of white lemon, rose wood and carambola give way to a heart of tarragon, clary sage and cedar leaves. The base notes of sycamore wood, amber and musk complete the fragrance by offering mysterious and skin-deep sensations.

column1: Versace Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Spray 30ml
column2: New for 2008, Versace launches Versace Pour Homme at Fragrance Direct. Versace pour Homme is a refreshing and vibrant scent, perfect for a sophisticated and stylish Versace man. The fragrance opens with a unique blend of top notes that include rose, bergamot, neroli and lemon. The vibrant start of Versace is then followed by heart notes of geranium, cedar, clary sage and hyacinth. The base notes of Versace pour Homme centre around amber, musk and tonka bean that create a warming finish to this fresh scent.

column1: Tommy Hilfiger Impact Spark Eau de Toilette Spray 50ml
column2: For those who dare to dream and disrupt, Impact Spark is a spirited woody fruity scent that captures the electricity of a big idea in the making. Ignite your passions as zesty Italian bergamot and green fig blend with a spiced cardamom heart for diffused, long lasting freshness. Indulge in an insatiable need to do more as AkigalawoodÂ®, a spicy, woody extract of patchouli, encourages your ambitions to run wild.

column1: GIVENCHY Pour Homme Blue Label Eau de Toilette Spray 50ml
column2:
Blue label is a relaxed version of GIVENCHY pour Homme. This fresh, dynamic and vibrant scent is ideal for the active man who likes to relax, unwind and feel free.
Still as elegant, but with a rebel touch.
The bottle is identical to that of GIVENCHY pour Homme but dressed in blue the colour of sky and adventure.

It reveals a woody fresh fragrance affiliated with GIVENCHY pour Homme, delivered by a combination of Davana, Cedar and Oliban woods.

Blue Label distinguishes itself by added freshness and sparkle thanks to a cocktail of grapefruit and bergamot and to the presence of Hedione.

column1: Dolce&Gabbana Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Spray 75ml
column2:
Dolce&Gabbana Pour Homme is the fragrance dedicated to the elegance and style of the Italian man.

An olfactory portrait that is able to project into the collective imagination the iconic power of irresistible sex appeal and tenderness.

The fragrance opens up with neroli and citrus hints of mandarin and bergamot.
In the heart the lavander, like a Mediterranean breeze, evokes of a mother's fresh laundry and the classic essence of a father. A touch of tobacco and tonka bean provide structure for the last dry notes of wood.

With an updated, smooth glass bottle, Dolce and Gabbana Pour Homme EDT is a great scent for men.

column1: HUGO BOSS BOSS Bottled Tonic Eau de Toilette 50ml
column2:
A fresh masculine twist on the classic fragrance, BOSS Bottled Tonic is the distillation of the fresh moment of clarity the Man of Today needs to regain composure, sharpen, reflect, and go again.

The first ever fresh fragrance from the iconic BOSS Bottled portfolio, BOSS Bottled Tonic reveals a new facet of modern masculinity, inviting the Man of Today to take a moment to refocus on his path to success.

An inherently masculine fresh fragrance, BOSS Bottled Tonic is an elegant composition of sophisticated citruses and rich woody notes to bring a lighter and refreshing dimension to the classic fragrance.

Fragrance Family: Amber
Top Notes: Vibrant Citrus Fruit, Apple
Heart Notes: Tonic Ginger, Cinnamon
Base Notes: Sensual Woody Notes

column1: dunhill London ICON Racing Red Eau de Parfum Spray 100ml
column2:
Offering a go-faster take on the modern-classic ICON fragrance collection, ICON Racing fragrances are inspired by dunhill's motoring heritage and infused with the spirit of the open road.

Icon Racing Red Edition was created for the driver who craves high speed and adrenaline, and who is unruffled by risk. Opening with a soaring solar accord accelerated further by black pepper and bright citrus notes, this scent deepens to a vibrant heart of geranium, cypress and pepper fusion over a base of cedar fusion, musks, moss and vetiver.

Presented in a red cylindrical ICON bottle with added racing stripe and textural Engine Turn detailing.

column1: Acqua Di Parma Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentree Natural Spray 100ml
column2:
Inspired by Italian leather and the savoir-faire of Italian tanneries in Tuscany, Colonia Leather is a stylish and unforgettable fragrance that combines the sophisticated freshness of Colonia with a warm aromatic leather accord.

The fragrance opens with a kaleidoscope of citrus fruit notes that blend perfectly with warm aromatic notes of rose, honeysuckle, Paraguayan petit grain and red thyme. Colonia Leather closes with a beautiful base that lends its name to the fragrance - a powerful leather accord in its deepest and most intense variety sublimated by a woody accent of Virginia cedarwood and spicy birchwood.

column1: GIVENCHY Xeryus Rouge Eau de Toilette Spray 100ml
column2:
Warm and intense, Xeryus Rouge is a classic, Woody Amber designed for a man who embraces his freedom and is a risk-taker at heart. His fiery, intuitive sensuality is irresistibly captivating with an underlying mystery that cannot be resisted. Succulent kumquat and green cactus are dusted with red pepper and crushed cedar wood for a seductive scent that lingers.

Woody Amber

Heart Note: Red Pepper
Base Note: Cedar Wood

column1: Acqua Di Parma Colonia Intensa Eau de Cologne Natural Spray 50ml
column2: Acqua di Parma creation was presented in 2007 as woody-leathery fragrance for men. It was created by two renowned noses, Alberto Morillas and Francois Demanchy. Colonia Intensa is masculine, intensive, noble and classical. It brings the sweet freshness of bergamot, citrus, cardamom and ginger in the top notes. The heart follows the aromatic line and is composed of myrtle, artemisia, neroli, cedar and Guaiac wood. The base unites leather, patchouli, benzoin and musk.

column1: Versace Man Eau Fraiche Eau de Toilette Spray 200ml
column2:
Versace boast a selection of classic scents at Fragrance Direct. Versace Man Eau Fraiche Eau de Toilette is a fresh aquatic perfume for men. Perfect for a lover of luxury, who is stylish yet elegant. Versace Man presents a fragrance with an explosion of bergamot and black pepper, enveloped by sensual notes of kashmir wood and rich tobacco leaves. Ultra-sophisticated, for the man who knows how to enjoy life to the fullest! Versace Man Eau Fraiche opens with top notes of star fruit, lemon, cardamom, rosewood and bergamot. The fragrance then blends seamlessly into a unique heart of pepper, cedar, sage and tarragon. The base to Versace Eau Fraiche includes notes of sycamore, musk, lotus and amber.

Please note: We are able to ship fragrances over 150ml outside of the UK.

column1: Calvin Klein CK Be Eau de Toilette 200ml
column2:
CK Be Eau de Toilette was distinctly designed to make a statement: Be yourself. Be bold.

Clean and sensual, a unisex fragrance that draws you in. True to the core of CK fragrances, this fragrance includes an inviting aromatic musk completed with a simple blend of herbs, citruses, and florals.

The scent opens with fresh bergamot, juniper berry, and warm lavender. Layered with white spices and magnolia, it dries with warming notes of sandalwood and tonka bean. This uplifting fragrance is designed to be worn across genders, both inspiring and inviting throughout its fresh signature.

Top notes: Bergamot, Juniper Berry, Lavender
Heart notes: White Spices, Magnolia, White Peach
Base notes: Sandalwood, Tonka Bean, Opoponax

column1: Ralph Lauren Polo Red Parfum Refill 150ml
column2:
Confidence, sensuality, intensity. The open road is a sirenâ€™s song. The desert heat captivates you; the golden-hour horizon beckonsâ€”vast, mysterious, yours to discover. Ralph Lauren Polo Red Parfum is into-the-night long-lasting and undeniably intense. An overdose of absinthe intoxicates, while fresh and opulent orris softens the edge. Sustainable bergamot and diva lavender heart merge to refine the captivating scent. The classic masculinity of cedarwood finishes the trip with seductive ruggedness. This journey into the desert expanse is an unforgettable thrill.
Seductive. Mysterious. Long-lasting.

Fragrance family: Woody Ambery

Notes:
Sustainable Bergamot heart, Blood Orange oil, Pink Peppercorn (top notes)
Absinthe oil, Orris (tbd), Sustainable Diva Lavender heart (middle notes)
Musk accord, Cedarwood heart, Opoponax accord (base notes)

How to use: Spray on pulse points such as wrists, neck, chest, wherever you feel a heartbeat.

Ralph Lauren is an iconic designer known for defining American style through his menâ€™s and womenâ€™s fashions, home furnishings, accessories and fragrances. The world of Ralph Lauren conveys a timeless luxury lifestyle with an enduring spirit of success, style and a sense of togetherness.

Versace Pour Homme eau de toilette spray for men is described as a floral and citrus perfume, opening with top notes of lemon, neroli, bergamot and rose, fusing with a heart of hyacinth, clary sage, cedar and geranium, all of which sits on top of a smooth base of Tonka bean, musks and amber.

Here at Fragrance Direct we have a whole host of Versace perfumes and toiletries in stock, and our customers are sure to love this Versace Pour Homme eau de toilette spray for men for its refreshing yet masculine aroma.

Versace was founded in 1978 by the late Gianni Versace, and has become one of the best known fashion houses in the world. Famous for his celebrity clientele such as Elton John, Jennifer Lopez and Liz Hurley, the Versace designs are known to be risquÃ© whilst still remaining chic. Many Versace perfumes have been launched over the years, and are instantly recognisable by the Medusa Head logo that adorns all of the Versace creations.

column1: Armaf Club De Nuit Intense Man Pure Parfum Spray 150ml
column2: A sophisticated masculine fragrance with bold tones of citrus, wood and spice. Club De Nuit Intense Man invites a fresh head of lemon, bergamot, pineapple, apple and blackcurrant. The heart features distinctive elements of birch, rose and jasmine. A final accord combines ambergris, musk, vanilla and patchouli.

column1: GIVENCHY Insense Ultramarine Eau de Toilette Spray 100ml
column2: Insense Ultramarine by Givenchy provides a refreshing trail of cool fruits and aromatic chords. A succulent watermelon note combines with black currant, galbanum and bergamot for a delicious fruity opening. The heart of the fragrance features an accord of iris, magnolia, mint, rosemary and cardamom creating a more savoury accord. Finally, a rich base of tobacco, vetiver and cedar provides a strong and woody base.

column1: Acqua Di Parma Sandalo Eau de Parfum Natural Spray 180ml

column1: Acqua Di Parma Colonia Eau de Cologne Natural Spray 180ml
column2:
Acqua di Parma Colonia Eau de Cologne Spray is a fragrance for both men and women.
Described as Fresh, light and suitable for wear in all seasons, Colonia is Acqua Di Parmas signature scent, unique and fresh and will linger for hours.
With top notes of Grapefruit, Mint and Blood Mandarin. Heart notes of Rose absolute, Cinnamon and spice settled on a base of Leather, Wood, Amber and Indian Patchouli.

column1: Acqua Di Parma Colonia Essenza Eau de Cologne Natural Spray 100ml
column2: Acqua Di Parma Colonia Essenza. Reinterprets the values and essence of Colonia, their cult cologne created in 1916. Using the finest quality ingredients Acqua di Parma have created a citrus, woody fragrance with an assertive personality. The aromatic top notes of classical Italian citrus and rosemary are intertwined with a delicate floral combination of rose, jasmine and lily of the valley. A touch of subtle spicy clove adds a warmth which carries through to a rich, woody base with notes of intense patchouli, soft white moss and warm amber.

column1: Acqua Di Parma Colonia Essenza Eau de Cologne Natural Spray 180ml
column2:
Colonia Essenza by Acqua Di Parma was launched in 2010 as a twist on the classic Colonia fragrance. This powerful woody, citrus fragrance opens with top notes of Grapefruit, Mandarin and Petit Grain. Middle notes of White Musk and warm Amber create a vivid animalic accord before being blended with a woody base of Patchouli to finish off this unique fragrance.

Please note: We are unable to ship fragrances over 150ml outside of the UK.
